Description:
Some careers shine brighter than others.If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realize their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of a Senior Consultant Specialist.In this role, you will:Need to implement the vision of the Sales and Marketing business at a lower technical level. 
Should produce, robust and scalable code using TDD and solid principles. 
Be responsible for setting up the guiding frameworks for the project and will be involved with leading proof of concepts to determine if the technology stack will work for the solution. and  for improving the estimation for the backlog grooming.
Implement low level technical design based on User story and Acceptance criteria. 
Work closely with the Business Analysts and S&M business to design given journeys and features in CRM based on product capabilities.
Be responsible for translating high-level designs/patterns into low-level technical specifications for custom development. 
Need to implement the vision of the Architects at a lower technical level and  should be able deliver and develop good quality code.
Be involved in proof of concepts to determine if the technology stack will work for the solution. 
Work as an Engineering Lead in Client Ops Sub Value stream under Asset Management IT.
Build solutions with an engineering mindset that not just achieve functional objectives but also cater to non-functional requirements with consistent performance that help our business to grow revenue. 
Work with global stake holders – engineering, delivery teams, architects. Driving full stack end to end solutions based on daily conversations within the scrum meeting.Job Details
